meanings.definition: Giving a sudden jerk or shake.
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster ride was joltier than expected.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake became even joltier as it continued.
meanings.sent3: The joltier car ride made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The joltier movements of the train felt like a wild dance.
meanings.sent5: The joltier shake of the washing machine startled the cat.

meanings.sent1: The storm grew even joltier as the night went on.
meanings.sent2: The music at the concert became joltier with each beat.
meanings.sent3: The joltier movie ending left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: The joltier waves crashed against the shore with force.
meanings.sent5: The joltier thunder made the windows rattle in their frames.
